title: Frontend Developer
description: Design and implement user interfaces. Collaborate with designers to create intuitive layouts. Ensure cross-browser compatibility and performance.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Develop and optimize backend services. Work with databases and APIs to ensure reliability. Optimize systems for performance and scalability.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Handle both frontend and backend tasks. Collaborate across teams to meet project requirements. Ensure seamless integration between systems.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Build and maintain mobile applications. Focus on creating responsive and user-friendly experiences. Continuously update the code to adopt new standards.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Handle both frontend and backend tasks. Collaborate across teams to meet project requirements. Ensure seamless integration between systems.
